resources.string: Memory full. Delete some files from SD card.
SD card write-protected. Cannot edit files.
Could not record video. Not enough memory.
To show this dialog, go to Settings > Apps.
To add geotags, you have to enable GPS and/or wireless networks. Enable now?
Press back to return to camera
Location acquired with GPS always takes precedence over wireless networks. To change how to get your location, go to Settings > Location services.
Not changeable in combination with the current Scene setting
Not available when smile detection is active
To view the 3D image, connect to a 3D TV with an HDMI cable
Zoom not available in 3D Sweep Panorama
Zoom not available in Sweep Multi Angle
Zoom not available in Sweep Panorama
Could not take picture. Please pan more slowly.
Could not take picture. Please pan faster.
Could not take picture. Please pan in the correct direction.
Could not complete the capturing. Please pan more slowly.
Could not complete the capturing. Please pan faster.
Could not complete the capturing. Please pan in the correct direction.
To operate this 3D image, use the TV remote control.
"Processing... This image contains a gray area"
"Creating the following files: - Multi Angle image - 3D image"
"Creating the following files: - Multi Angle image - 3D image Note: These files contain a gray area."
Press the camera key and slowly pan the camera
Change direction by tapping icon on the left
Tap the camera button and slowly pan the camera
There is also a Multi Angle photo for this 3D image. Delete both?
There is also a 3D image for this Multi Angle photo. Delete both?
Unplug the cable. You cannot take a photo in this mode with a cable connected.
To view this file in 3D, use a 3D supported device.
Cannot establish location using GPS satellites
Cannot establish location with wireless networks
Unavailable in combination with the current Capturing mode.
Touch the screen to take photo
Memory full. Delete some files from the memory or change the default save location.
Memory write-protected. Could not edit files.
Tap anywhere on the screen to focus and take a photo
Cannot move the shortcut icon during the quick launch mode
Please wait for a few seconds to launch 3D camera
Camera is in Quick Launch mode. Settings is not available. Go back to the normal mode?
Screen lock is set. To use the Quick Launch, unlock the screen to enable this feature.

With Quick Launch, you can instantly activate the camera from the phone sleep mode by pressing and holding the camera key. This feature turns the camera on even if the screen is locked. Allow Quick Launch?
With Quick Capture, you can instantly launch the camera and then immediately take the first photo by keeping holding down the camera key
Use volume key to zoom in/out
To view a photo in 3D, connect your phone to a 3D TV by using a HDMI or tapping Play on device button.
Touch the screen to record a video
To view this photo in 3D, connect your phone to a 3D TV by tapping Play on device button.
No SD card available. Changed default save location to internal storage.
SD card available. Changed default save location to SD card.
Double tap to switch to camera
Double tap to switch to video
Displaying the first page of two pages
Up to five most recent photos are displayed in line
The shortcut has been set at the top of the shortcut area
The shortcut has been set at the second top of the shortcut area
The shortcut has been set at the bottom of the shortcut area
You are going to remove the shortcut
The selected shortcut has been removed
Unsupported cable. Tap the Throw icon to connect your device to a 3D TV.
Tap the portion you want to color
Use your fingers to edit the displayed image
Tap the screen to toggle color
Camera is temporarily unavailable due to high temperature. Please wait for your device to cool down before you can use the camera.
Shutting down camera due to high temperature. Your recorded videos will be saved. Please wait for your phone to cool down before restarting the camera.
Camera is temporarily unavailable due to high temperature. Please wait for your device to cool down before you can use the camera again.
Temperature is getting high! Camera will shut off when it gets too hot. Do you want to close it now?
Tap the screen to change the effect
Resolution changed to 12MP with HDR On
Resolution changed to 9MP with HDR On
Resolution changed to 7MP with HDR On
Resolution changed to 5MP with HDR On
Resolution changed to 13MP with HDR Off
Resolution changed to 10MP with HDR Off
Resolution changed to 8MP with HDR Off
Resolution changed to 6MP with HDR Off
SD card full. Changed default save location to internal storage.
Internal memory full. Changed default save location to SD card.
Shutting down camera due to high temperature. Your recorded movies will be saved. Please wait for your phone to cool down before restarting the camera.
Could not record movie. Not enough memory.
Touch the screen to record a movie
To add location information to your photos or movies, you have to enable GPS and/or wireless networks. Enable now?
Still Image Size changed to 10MP with HDR Off
Still Image Size changed to 12MP with HDR On
Still Image Size changed to 13MP with HDR Off
Still Image Size changed to 5MP with HDR On
Still Image Size changed to 6MP with HDR Off
Still Image Size changed to 7MP with HDR On
Still Image Size changed to 8MP with HDR Off
Still Image Size changed to 9MP with HDR On
Cannot zoom at this Still Image Size
Still Image Size changed to 10MP upon mode change
Still Image Size changed to 12MP upon mode change
Still Image Size changed to 13MP upon mode change
Still Image Size changed to 5MP upon mode change
Still Image Size changed to 6MP upon mode change
Still Image Size changed to 7MP upon mode change
Still Image Size changed to 8MP upon mode change
Still Image Size changed to 9MP upon mode change
"Set save location to internal storage or insert SD card with high write speed for stable continuous shooting with higher resolution"
Resolution changed to 1MP with HDR On
Resolution changed to 12MP upon mode change
Resolution changed to 7MP upon mode change
Resolution changed to 1MP upon mode change
Cannot add more files. File size too large.
Camera lens located as shown in illustration
Resolution changed to 1.8MP with HDR On
Unavailable due to high temperature in device. Wait for it to cool down.
This mode became unavailable due to temperature rise in device. Please wait for your device to cool down.
"Tag your photos and videos with the locations where they are taken. You can change this setting later from the camera's Geotagging setting."
Use of camera restricted for security reasons
Tap this to select another mode
Double tap to switch to front camera
Double tap to switch to rear camera
Find the best shot by sliding the thumbnails up or down
Use Xperia™ camera add-ons and add the functions to the camera app
Take photos and videos with automatically optimized settings
Manually adjust your camera settings to take photos and videos
Select an artistic effect to apply on photos
Take a panoramic photo by sweeping your camera
Find the best photo from burst images taken before and after your shot
Because HDR captures and combines two images of the same scene, it is only suitable for still objects.
Tap and hold to take continuous shots
To take one photo only, release your finger before the focus is locked.
SD card full. Default save location changed to internal storage.
Memory full. Delete some files from SD card or internal storage.
SD card inserted. Change default save location to SD card ?
To configure this setting, change resolution.
Focus mode setting changed to Face detection.
To configure this setting, change resolution.
I consent to the Sony Mobile Terms of Use.
To enable stable 4K video recording, set save location to Internal storage or use a high-speed SD card. Change save location to Internal storage?
Your use of this service may be subject to mobile data charges depending on your data plan.

Sony Mobile will collect your hashed Android ID unique device identifier, location-based data and timestamp in order to provide you with appropriate results as part of the service and for service improvements.
Select effects for artistic photos and videos
Record video in 4K ultra high definition
Record high frame rate video and apply slow motion effects
Save location set to Internal storage for stable video recording.

"For stable video recording, we recommend you change save location to internal storage. Would you like to change now?
If you continue to use SD card as data storage, be sure to use a high-speed SD card."
For stable 4K video recording, you must not change this setting unless you use a high-speed SD card. Change anyway?
For stable Timeshift video recording, you must not change this setting unless you use a high-speed SD card. Change anyway?
Select up to 5 faces for the camera to focus on
You cannot set more than 5 faces
"Only unnamed faces found. To add name tags to photos, go to Album and select Faces."
